summary: The module implements a collection of neural network layers and utilities for building time‑delay neural network (TDNN) based acoustic models. It provides a 1‑D convolutional TDNN layer with optional padding, a compact squeeze‑excitation TDNN block, statistical and attentive pooling layers that aggregate temporal features (including masked mean/std computation), and helper functions for generating sequence masks and extracting masked statistics.
business_intent: Supply reusable, high‑performance components for constructing speech‑recognition acoustic models that require efficient temporal convolutions, channel‑wise attention, and robust pooling over variable‑length audio sequences.
